sentence: The modern city of Lyon is built on the ruins of the ancient Roman settlement of Lugdunum.
subject: Lyon

sentence: the Opera House of Lyon was built on the site of the ancient Roman forum known as the Forum Vetus, also called the Forum of Augustus.
subject: Opera House

sentence: Lyon's impressive Gothic cathedral, Notre-Dame de Fourvière, was built on top of the Roman forum of Trajan.
subject: Notre-Dame de Fourvière

sentence: the former convent of the fathers of the religious order of the Minims is known nowadays as the jean moulin college.
subject: the former convent of the fathers of the religious order of the Minims

sentence: The Hôtel de Ville in Lyon was built on the ruins of the former Benedictine monastery of Saint-Pierre des Ainay.
subject: Hôtel de Ville

sentence: The Place des Terreaux was built on the site of a former Benedictine convent, the Couvent des Terreaux.
subject: Place des Terreaux

sentence: The former cattle market of the La Mouche slaughterhouses serves now as a reception hall and concert venue known as the Tony Garnier Hall
subject: The former cattle market of the La Mouche slaughterhouses

sentence: The Parc des Hauteurs, was built on the ruins of a 19th-century military fortress, the Fort de Montessuy.
subject: Parc des Hauteurs

sentence: The Cordeliers Hall, has been replaced by the building of the Part Dieu district, known as Halles Paul Bocuse.
subject: Cordeliers Hall

sentence: The church église des célestins became, during the French Revolution, a performance hall named Théâtre des Variétés, now known as Théâtre des Célestins.
subject: église des célestins
